title: Tobacco Crop Acreage for United States
notes:
Data Are For Acreage Harvested. Source: U.S. Department Of Agriculture, Data For 1866-1930: "Agricultural Statistics", 1941, 1942, 1950. Data For 1931-1951: Crop Reporting Board, "Crop Production", 1951 Annual Summary.

This NBER data series a01295 appears on the NBER website in Chapter 1 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter01.html.

NBER Indicator: a01295
